title: Career package
creator_credit: Ted Robinson, Eve Ash and Seven Dimensions
brief_description: Consist of three programmes suitable for use in a work education programm. 1. “The job interview”. 2. “Getting there-getting where. 3. “Study Tips”. These titles are also available as individual titles.
